src:
Perkenalkan Ini Robot Forex Trading dalam Genggaman
04 Nov 2019, 07:08 by Angga Laraspati


Foto: Dok. PT SMI

Jakarta - Penasaran mau menjajal trading di pasar mata uang (foreign exchange/forex)? Caranya gampang kok, apalagi sekarang sudah ada robot trading yang bisa menjadi asisten virtual Anda cukup lewat genggaman.Kehadiran robot trading ini tentu akan memudahkan, khususnya bagi newbie di industri forex. Sebab software ini juga kerap disebut sebagai Expert Advisor (EA), yang mampu bekerja untuk mencari peluang open trade, baik open sell ataupun buy di forex market. Jadi, robot trading di sini bukan secara fisik, melainkan software untuk trading forex secara otomatis, namun tetap kendali ada di tangan Anda.Salah satu robot trading yang bisa menjadi pilihan adalah NET89 yang dikembangkan oleh PT Simbiotik Multitalenta Indonesia (SMI). Cukup di-install di handphone, NET89 dapat diandalkan untuk trading di market cryptocurrency dan forex secara otomatis.CEO PT SMI, Andreas Andreyanto, mengungkapkan salah satu kelebihan yang disukai user usai menggunakan software EA Net89 adalah adanya profit konsisten. Selain itu, software ini juga sudah dilengkapi logic antimargin call dan 100% otomatis robot yang bekerja."Jika sudah menggunakan NET89, pemain baru di pasar Forex dijamin akan langsung ON. Anda tidak perlu pandai/bisa melakukan trading dan tidak perlu membuang energi di depan monitor," ujar Andreas dalam keterangan tertulis, Senin (4/11/2019)."Cukup pantau menggunakan gadget dan dana dikelola sendiri, tidak titip ke perusahaan," lanjutnya.PT Simbiotik Multitalenta Indonesia (SMI) sendiri bukanlah pemain baru di industri forex. Mereka bahkan menjadi salah satu pionir dalam pembuatan aplikasi trading secara otomatis di market cryptocurrency maupun forex. Dengan pengalaman yang sudah teruji dalam bidang trading, PT SMI memiliki visi untuk mengembangkan aplikasi yang berguna untuk meningkatkan profit dari transaksi trading yang dilakukan para partnernya.


Foto: Dok. PT SMI

Rencana ekspansi PT SMI pun dipertegas dengan peresmian kantor barunya yang berada di gedung Soho Capital lantai 31, Jakarta Barat. Selanjutnya pada 8 November 2019, PT SMI akan membuka kantor cabang di Surabaya, tepatnya di gedung Pakuwon Tower Lt 11."Semoga dengan rencana ekspansi ini akan semakin banyak masyarakat yang lebih mengenal bisnis forex dan menambah keyakinan konsumen kita," tukas Andreas.Ditambahkannya, PT SMI bukanlah perusahaan investasi ataupun BO HYIP (High Yield Invesment Program). Perusahaan ini murni perusahaan IT yang menjual software robot trading."Ini murni merupakan perusahaan IT dengan jenis produk yang dipasarkan berupa software trading cryptocurrency dan forex. Software/robot trading adalah suatu software atau program komputer yang digunakan untuk melakukan trading secara otomatis yang telah terprogram," ungkapnya.Bagi yang ingin mencari tahu lebih detail terkait NET89 dan bagaimana cara kerjanya sehingga bisa menjadi ladang pendapatan Anda di bisnis forex trading, bisa pula mengikuti seminar yang diadakan oleh PT SMI."Kalau ingin tahu lebih jelas, silakan datang ke seminar kami. Kami selalu rutin melakukan seminar ke tiap-tiap daerah untuk memasarkan produk unggulan kami Robot NET89," tutup Andreas. Simak Video "Bareskrim Akan Bentuk Satgas Kasus Forex Bodong GCG Asia "[Gambas:Video 20detik](ads/ads)
text:
Introduce This Forex Trading Robot in the Grip
Nov 04 2019, 07:08 by Angga Laraspati


Photo: Doc. PT SMI

Jakarta - Want to try trading on the currency market (foreign exchange / forex)? The trick is easy, especially now that there is a trading robot that can be your virtual assistant through grips. The presence of this trading robot will certainly make it easier, especially for newbies in the forex industry. Because this software is also often referred to as Expert Advisor (EA), which is able to work to find open trade opportunities, both open sell or buy on the forex market. So, trading robots here are not physical, but software for forex trading automatically, but you still have control. One of the trading robots that can be an option is NET89 developed by PT Simbiotik Multitalenta Indonesia (SMI). Simply installed on mobile phones, NET89 can be relied upon to trade in the cryptocurrency and forex markets automatically. CEO PT SMI, Andreas Andreyanto, revealed that one of the advantages that users like after using EA Net89 software is the consistent profit. In addition, this software is also equipped with an anti-margin logic logic and 100% automatic robot that works. "If you already use NET89, new players in the Forex market are guaranteed to be immediately ON. You don't need to be smart / able to trade and don't need to waste energy in front monitor, "Andreas said in a written statement, Monday (11/04/2019)." Simply monitor using gadgets and self-managed funds, not entrusted to the company, "he continued. PT Symbiotic Multitalenta Indonesia (SMI) itself is not a new player in the forex industry . They even became one of the pioneers in making automated trading applications in the cryptocurrency and forex markets. With proven experience in trading, PT SMI has a vision to develop applications that are useful for increasing profits from trading transactions conducted by its partners.


Photo: Doc. PT SMI

The expansion plan of PT SMI was confirmed by the inauguration of its new office located in the Soho Capital building on the 31st floor, West Jakarta. Furthermore, on November 8, 2019, PT SMI will open a branch office in Surabaya, precisely in the Pakuwon Tower Building 11th Floor. "Hopefully with this expansion plan more and more people will become familiar with the forex business and increase our consumer confidence," Andreas said. PT SMI is not an investment company or BO HYIP (High Yield Investment Program). This company is purely an IT company that sells trading robot software. "This is purely an IT company with a type of product that is marketed in the form of cryptocurrency and forex trading software. Software / trading robot is a software or computer program that is used to carry out automated trading that has been programmed, "he said. For those who want to find out more in detail related to NET89 and how it works so that it can become your income field in the forex trading business, you can also attend the seminar held by PT SMI." If you want to know more clearly, please come to our seminar. We always routinely conduct seminars to each region to market our superior product Robot NET89, "closed Andreas. Check out the video "Bareskrim Will Form a Task Force on Forex GCG False Cases" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (ads / ads)
